sentences.sContent: I assume her politics must be fairly conservative.
sentences.sCn: 我猜她的政治观点一定相当保守。

sentences.sContent: ...many students viewed politics with suspicion and distaste...
...a politics scholar at the University of London who specializes in Antarctica...
...What do we learn about American politics from the passage...
...Trying to quantify or measure the impact of women in politics is hard because in very few countries have there been enough women in politics to make a difference...
...The question is not so much whether 20th-century capitalism is failing 21st-century society but whether politics can rise to the challenge of changing a flawed economic model...
...We don’t cover party politics or economics...
